name: ATOMIC UNLOCKED
description:
Game submission for GameDev Unlocked Game Jam!

Mysterious world, mysterious event!

You are slowly shrinking to ATOM! To regain your scale, find and go through The LIGHT OF SCALE. and your scale will be back to normal. However it only temporary! You got 30 seconds to go through the next light and unlocked another 30 seconds of your time! Try your best to stay ALIVE!

: Hit the Yellow Light to stay alive.

Control: Keyboard

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Look Around 
  • Space - Handbrake

Control: Joystick (Xbox360)

  • RT, LT - Move Forward & Backward
  • Left Joystick - Left & Right
  • Right Joystick - Look Around
  • B - Handbrake

Credit:

GDU Assets pack, Vehicle Physic Pro, Playmaker, Stylizer, Unity Store Assets,

British Compact Car - Low Poly Model by Daniel Zhabotinsky: https://skfb.ly/6Vs8M

Sound:

  • Chris Zabriskie - Another Version of You
  • Savfx - Naked
  • Alpha Century - omega prime blackstar
